item.description:
An elegant affair--cocktail dress is encouraged!

Brought to you by MetaMovements, Rumba Na' Ma', DJ Hernan & SalsaBoston

When: Saturday Nov 22nd 8:30 pm - 1am
Who: All salsa lovers!
Where: City Club; 20 Inner Belt Rd. Sullivan Square/Somerville (Across from the Holiday Inn)

Directions: http://salsaboston.co...

What's happening:
Live music with Gilberto Rivera y Rumba Na' Ma'!
Georgeous dance floor - Free parking - Full bar
Salsa Lesson 8:30 PM
Dance 'till 1:00AM
Cost: $15 at the door; $12 in advance; discounts for dance companies and groups
For regular online tickets www.bostonsalsero.com

For discount packages, please contact anara@metamovements.com
This event will SELL OUT! - Get your tickets today

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Thanksgiving Salsa Party
